sentences.sContent: A high seating position makes ingress and egress easy.
sentences.sContent_eng: A high seating position makes ingress and egress easy.
sentences.sCn: 较高的座椅位置使入口和出口容易。

sentences.sContent: The touch-screen surface eliminates pushbutton cavities which prevents liquid ingress.
sentences.sContent_eng: The touch-screen surface eliminates pushbutton cavities which prevents liquid ingress.
sentences.sCn: 触摸屏表面没有按钮腔，这就避免了液体的进入。

sentences.sContent: The rugged construction is double-sealed to prevent water and dust ingress even during site wiring.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rugged construction is double-sealed to prevent water and dust ingress even during site wiring.
sentences.sCn: 坚固的建筑是双重密封，以防止水和灰尘进入即使在现场布线。

synos.tran: 进入；[计]入口；准许进入；入境

remMethod.val: in(进去) + gress(走) → 走进去 → 进入

trans.tranOther: the right to enter a place, or the act of entering it
